courses.title: Basic Computer Course
courses.description: This Basic Computer Course is thoughtfully designed for complete beginners who want to build a strong foundation in digital skills. Throughout the course, you will learn how to operate a computer confidently, understand essential computer components, and perform daily tasks without any confusion. You will explore MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in detail, gaining the ability to create documents, manage data, and design presentations professionally. The course also covers typing practice, file handling, internet usage, online safety, email management, and many practical digital activities that are required in modern jobs and education. By the end of this course, you will feel confident using a computer independently and will be well-prepared for advanced computer and programming courses.

courses.title: Tally Prime Course
courses.description: This Tally Prime Course is designed for students, professionals, and beginners who want to build strong accounting skills with practical, real-world knowledge. Throughout this course, you will learn how to manage accounts, create ledgers, record vouchers, handle GST, generate reports, and maintain business financials with complete accuracy. You will explore essential features like inventory management, bill-by-bill adjustments, balance sheets, profit & loss statements, and banking processes in Tally. The course also covers GST returns, tax invoices, credit notes, and all major accounting operations used in companies today. By the end of this course, you will be able to confidently manage business accounts and handle financial tasks professionally.

courses.title: Professional DTP Course
courses.description: This DTP (Desktop Publishing) Course is designed for creative learners who want to master professional design and publishing tools used in the digital and print media industry. Throughout the course, you will learn to work with essential software like Photoshop, CorelDRAW, Illustrator, and InDesign for creating stunning posters, banners, brochures, business cards, logos, magazines, and layouts. You will understand color theory, typography, image editing, page design, and print setup in a practical, easy-to-follow way. The course focuses on hands-on projects that help you build confidence and develop a strong design portfolio.

courses.title: Advanced Excel Course
courses.description: This Advanced Excel Course is designed for learners who want to upgrade their data-handling and analytical skills for professional growth. Throughout the course, you will dive deep into powerful Excel tools such as advanced formulas, conditional functions, data validation, Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP and XLOOKUP, dashboards, charts, automation features, and data cleaning techniques. You will also learn how to work with large datasets, perform complex calculations, and create interactive business reports.

courses.title: Web Development Course
courses.description: This Web Development Course is designed for students and beginners who want to learn how modern websites and web applications are built. Throughout the course, you will learn the complete front-end development process, starting from HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactive functionality. You will also explore responsive design, layout techniques, animations, and best coding practices used in real-world projects.

courses.title: Digital Marketing Course
courses.description: This Digital Marketing Course is designed for beginners and professionals who want to master the skills required to grow a business online. Throughout the course, you will learn essential digital marketing concepts including SEO, social media marketing, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, content marketing, email marketing, website optimization, analytics, and branding strategies.

courses.title: Stock Market Course
courses.description: This Stock Market Course is designed for beginners and aspiring traders who want to understand how the financial markets work and how to invest smartly. Throughout the course, you will learn the fundamentals of the stock market, including shares, indices, brokers, demat accounts, and trading platforms. You will explore essential concepts like technical analysis, chart reading, candlestick patterns, market trends, risk management, and long-term investing strategies.

Throughout the course, you will learn the fundamentals of computers, operating systems, MS Office tools, typing, file management, email handling, and basic internet usage.

courses.title: Python Programming Course
courses.description: This Python Programming Course is designed for students and beginners who want to learn one of the most powerful and beginner-friendly programming languages used in the tech industry. Throughout the course, you will learn the fundamentals of Python, including variables, data types, loops, conditions, functions, lists, dictionaries, and object-oriented programming.
